title: Lying Heart
overview: Ravee and Pring are cousins, however, Pring is envious of Ravee because Ravee has everything. Due to their jealousy, they try to take away everything good in Ravee's life. Ravee blames them for her mother leaving.Thaywa is a single father with a daughter, Tawan. He fell in love at first sight with Ravee however, Ravee believes that he is an irresponsible father and a player, Da, Thaywa's sister, hates Ravee and blamed her for the death of her husband, Prasin. She wants Ravee to suffer for this. Thaywa is torn between his sister and the one he loves.
